task.summary: Default task
Task: Added laravel files and created/authenticated database
Feature: Created a model for tickets, updated it's migration table and added functions into it's models
Feature: Created a model for categories, updated it's migration table and added functions into it's model.
Feature: Created a controller for opening tickets through TicketsController, added functions into it and also added categories to database using tinker command
Task: Added routes to get and post new tickets using create and store functions
Feature: Created and added content to a create blade for ticket creation and flash blade for displaying flashing session status
Feature: Added a store function in TicketsController in-order to save the ticket
Feature: Created an AppMailer app to send ticket info to the user
Task: Created a blade holding mail contents on sending an email response to the user on ticket info
Fix: Added mailtrap credentials, changed the mail-driver to log and fixed namespaces
Feature: Added a function userTickets to TicketsController that lets the user check his opened user tickets along with the details
Feature: Added a route for MyTickets view page, created a blade for user_tickets and added tabled contents to it
Feature: Added a function to show particular ticket information in TicketsController and added a route for show view page
Feature: Created a blade that shows ticket details for each ticket that is opened
Feature: Created a model for giving comments on tickets and added more columns to it's migration table
Feature: Added ticket to comment relationship such that a ticket can have many comments and a comment can belong to a ticket
Feature: Added user to comment relationship such that a user can have many comments and a comment can belong to a user
Feature: Added user to ticket relationship such that a user can have many tickets and a ticket can belong to a user
Feature: Created a controller for comments, added a function that posts comments and sends the comment posted by another user to the authenticated user through mail
Task and Fix: Enabled comments to be shown on the user's tickets as and when posted, created route for posting comments and fixed display message on CommentsController
Feature and Task: Added a function to send the posted ticket comments through mail notification to the user and created a blade containing the mail contents for the same
Feature: Created an admin middleware in-order to bring in closure of tickets, added admin access in the kernel and a few routes specifically for the admin accessible pages
Feature: Added an index function that gets all the tickets that have been created and a close function to TicketsController which on closure of tickets sends notification to the user through mailer
Task: Created an index page to show all the tickets and the ones closed by the admin
Feature: Added a function to send the ticket status to the user in AppMailer and created a page that holds the mail content on the ticket status
Feature: Added a construct function to provide middleware auth in TicketsController and modified home page
